PRIVACY.TITLE: Privacy Policy
PRIVACY.INTRO: At Transcendence ('we', 'our', 'the Company'), we respect and protect the privacy of our users. This Privacy Policy explains how we handle personal information on our Transcendence website.

SECTION_1.CONTENT: The data controller for personal data on this website is:

SECTION_2.TITLE: 2. Collection of Personal Data
SECTION_2.CONTENT: We collect users' email addresses as a mandatory requirement when registering on our website. Additionally, users may choose to provide us with their email address voluntarily when sending an email to the address provided in this Privacy Policy. We do not collect any other personally identifiable information, such as names, physical addresses, or phone numbers.

SECTION_3.TITLE: 3. Use of Cookies
SECTION_3.CONTENT: Our website does not use cookies or other tracking technologies to collect information about visitors. This includes both first-party and third-party cookies.

SECTION_4.CONTENT: Our website may contain links to other websites that are not operated by us. If you click on a third-party link, you will be directed to that third-party’s site. We recommend that you review the privacy policy of every site you visit. We have no control over, and assume no responsibility for, the content, privacy policies, or practices of third-party websites.

SECTION_5.TITLE: 5. Data Security
SECTION_5.CONTENT: Although we do not collect personal data, we have implemented appropriate security measures to protect any information you may provide us through other means, specifically via emails.

SECTION_6.TITLE: 6. Your Rights
SECTION_6.INTRO: As a user, you have the right to:

SECTION_6.RECTIFICATION: Rectification: Request the correction of any incorrect personal data.

SECTION_6.LIMITATION: Restriction: Restrict the processing of your personal data in certain cases.
SECTION_6.OPPOSITION: Objection: Object to the processing of your personal data.
SECTION_6.OUTRO: If you wish to exercise any of these rights, please contact us using the details provided in section 1.

SECTION_7.TITLE: 7. Changes to the Privacy Policy
SECTION_7.CONTENT: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or applicable law. Any changes will be posted on this page, and the date of the last update will be indicated.

TERMS_AND_CONDITIONS.TITLE: Terms and Conditions
TERMS_AND_CONDITIONS.INTRO: Transcendence ('we', 'our') is committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring transparency in the processing of your personal data. To comply with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), we ask for your explicit consent to collect and process the following personal data when you create an account on our website.

SECTION_1.TITLE: 1. Personal Data Collected
SECTION_1.INTRO: When creating an account on our website, we will collect and process the following personal data:

DATA.PICTURES: Pictures: Only two pictures are collected, one as the user’s representative image and the other as a background image for their profile.
DATA.PASSWORD: Email: To identify and communicate with you.
DATA.EMAIL: Password: To secure access to your account.
DATA.USERNAME: Username: To identify your account on our site.
DATA.CODE: Linking code (optional): You may choose to link your account with a third-party service (42 in our case) using a linking code.

SECTION_2.TITLE: 2. Purpose of Data Processing
SECTION_2.INTRO: Your personal data will be processed for the following purposes:

DATA.EMAIL: Email: To manage your account and send service-related notifications.
DATA.PASSWORD: Password: To secure access to your account confidentially.
DATA.USERNAME: Username: To identify your account in our system and allow you to interact with other site features.
DATA.CODE: Linking code (optional): To allow linking with third-party services, facilitating access and enhancing your experience on our website.

SECTION_3.TITLE: 3. Legal Basis for Processing
SECTION_3.CONTENT: The processing of your personal data is based on your explicit consent (Art. 6.1.a GDPR) by ticking the relevant box and submitting this form.

SECTION_4.TITLE: 4. Duration of Data Processing
SECTION_4.CONTENT: Your personal data will be retained as long as your account remains active. If you choose to close your account, we will delete your personal data unless we are required to retain it to comply with legal obligations.

SECTION_5.TITLE: 5. Data Subject Rights

LIST.ELEMENT_1: Access your personal data and obtain a copy.
LIST.ELEMENT_2: Rectify any inaccurate or incomplete data.
LIST.ELEMENT_3: Delete your personal data when it is no longer necessary for the purposes for which it was collected.
LIST.ELEMENT_4: Restrict the processing of your data in certain circumstances.
LIST.ELEMENT_5: Port your personal data to another data controller.
LIST.ELEMENT_6: Object to the processing of your personal data in certain situations.

SECTION_5.OUTRO: To exercise your rights, you can contact us at any time at pongtrancendence@gmail.com.

SECTION_6.TITLE: 6. International Data Transfers
SECTION_6.CONTENT: Your personal data will not be transferred outside the European Economic Area (EEA), unless appropriate safeguards are in place in accordance with the GDPR.

SECTION_7.TITLE: 7. Consent
SECTION_7.CONTENT: By ticking the box and registering, you freely, specifically, and unambiguously consent to the processing of your personal data as described in this policy.
